website_summaries.verdict: A large, multifunction, dual-layer stainless steel soy milk maker that features bottom heating for even cooking temperatures.
pros: Presto Pure's 1/2 gallon hot soy milk maker has a wide variety of settings that include everything from grinding dry nuts to cleaning
The machine features filterless grinding, which can make clean ups easier, and it comes with a 1-year limited warranty
cons: A minor drawback is the need to make the full 1/2 gallon batch for most recipes

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this machine, I make a lot of vegan cheese and the hardest part was making the soymilk, so much time, effort and mess. Now I only soak the beans, add them to the machine, add water, press a button and in 30mins, it's done. The bottom is starting to look burned, I don't know if that's normal but it hasn't affected the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Perez Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Very good soy milke machine
customer_reviews.text: I had used other two soy milk machines before I bought this one. Each machine worked just for a year or less, even someone told me that maker's products are very good. I knew that this machine is much better than previous ones. 1) This machine can make more soy mike than previous ones. 2) This machine is easier to clean after making soy milk. 3) The work time of making soy milk is shorter than previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: Bing Zhu

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine...its so easy to make my almond or cashew milk. Takes about 20 minutes and its so good and simple. The company's warrantee and customer service is amazing. My machine started to make a noise and i reached out to the company and they are sending me a new one. And a prepaid label to send this one back. How awesome is that!!!! Love and will continue to make my milk at home, rather than buy ones w added chemicals
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product-I can't do without it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this machine at least twice a week! It makes the best soymilk, almond milk and hemp milk in only 30 minutes. I highly recommend this to anyone looking to eliminate all the thickeners, stabilizers and unnecessary sweeteners present in commercial varieties. Perfect for whole foods plant-based lifestyles. Makes pureed soups quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Brzezicki

customer_reviews.title: Loud Squealing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean-up and you can do easy experiments with the ingredients that go into these nut milks....My only complaint is that the blender portion of the machine squeals loudly when it functions-very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: bitbob

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Quick making bean milks and pureed soups, taking 20-30 mins 2. Durable stainless chamber 3. Easy to clean Con: 1. The strainer and pitcher are made of plastic
customer_reviews.author: gobbie

customer_reviews.title: Easy and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after watching several online videos of other brands. The Presto Pure IAE15-1.9 liter machine is so simple to use, cleans easily—and most important—makes nut milks that are wonderfully fresh and without additives. I’d recommend it to anyone avoiding dairy, or if you want to get off the processed food train. I made almond milk yesterday and I will never go back to the chemical tasting carton varieties. Delighted with my purchase, highly recommend, and will soon be purchasing another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bradach

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use the plastic Jar provided
customer_reviews.text: Take 30 mins to make 2 cup of soy milk. We put the water under the max line but still milk coming out of it every time when it is blending. My mom burn her hands while pouring the soy milk out of the plastic jar that was provided because of the plastic handle came apart and everything spilled everywhere and burn my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Max Lu

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: I've got to say, I wasn't so sure about making my own soy milk at first. But I have to drink non-dairy milk and wanted to avoid preservatives. This machine is super easy to use and clean! The beans I bought were inexpensive, and the milk tastes so much better than store bought soy milk. I can't wait to try out the other settings for cashew and rice milk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this milk maker with other uses is a little larger than some others and is easy to use. I find the beeper a little weak. If one has good hearing and if one does not get too distracted with other things it is sufficient. Its blending power is great. I have not been able to duplicate it with any other apparatus. The inside bottom of the pitcher is a little difficult to clean with the edges it has.
customer_reviews.author: Grant A. Barbey

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've purchased (one for my vacation house). I use it every 3 days and it's amazingly simple. It's easy to clean as long as you do it IMMEDIATELY while still hot and wet. Use a brush and running water.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worked well so far
customer_reviews.text: I got another famous brand but it did not work, so I got this later for a cheaper prices but it delivers the quality I am asking.
customer_reviews.author: Zhan

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend purchasing this product. I saved a lot of money making my own milk with no chemicals added.
customer_reviews.author: lloadh1875

customer_reviews.title: Squeaking loud noise
customer_reviews.text: I bot this in November 30, 2019. After the 3rd time use, the loud squeaky noise started to happen; further more, when doing the dry bean with no soaking option, the end product still have visible WHOLE piece of beans.. u fortunately, i am afraid this machine will be breaking down soon with this loud squeaking noise, i returned it for JoyMilk model
customer_reviews.author: Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Great soup maker, but doesn’t allow you to make smaller portions of soups/milk
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, not very noisy. Makes very smooth pureed soups. Although it doesn’t have an option to make chunk soup like other similar soup makers. Also there is a minimum requirement of water to be added, so there is really no way to make a smaller portion other than the 2 liters. That’s the downside of this model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure u doesn't have water go pass the maximum line. Because it will overflow
customer_reviews.text: Just like it advertised. My mother been enjoy using it
customer_reviews.author: long

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I was hesitant about buying another kitchen appliance, but I’m using this all the time to make soups. It’s so easy. It’s very sturdy. Love the simple recipes that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tami L Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This product has plastic parts inside.
customer_reviews.text: Since this is a product that uses high heat, I do not want plastic parts inside. Therefore, I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: All metal, large volume, powerful but plastic accessories
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've made rice milk, creamed soup, coconut & peanut milk and they all turned out great! I'm waiting for my organic soy beans to start soy milk and ultimately...tofu! This machine makes a large amount. Id only change the plastic accessories. I got this model because it is mostly stainless steel but was not glad about the plastic strainer and pitcher. Metal, glass, wood or nothing at all would be better. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Davina Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, have made almond milk two times. Like that it makes almost 2 quarts.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Dead on the third time use it
customer_reviews.text: It work good for few time. I bought TWO, one to keep and one for sister over sea. They both dead after few use. I am very unhappy with this product. I wish I could rewind time so that I can cancel my order (too late). I would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love it! We use it for coconut milk mostly but I love how East it is to have fresh coconut milk! The store close to us never has it so now I can make it as we need it!
customer_reviews.author: LynnSOwens

customer_reviews.title: Great product makes great soy and almond milk
customer_reviews.text: Great product makes great soy and almond milk. Very easy to use and makes excellent soup also. I would highly recommend this to anyone wanting to make soy or almond milk at home.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Customer service to help with the product was amazing!! Thank you Ally! She helped 100%... thank you presto pure!!
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Good milk maker. Love the machine
customer_reviews.text: Have used this machine a few times per week to make my almond milk and soy milk for many months. It makes good milk. The only part i don't like is the burning area at the bottom of the machine. It's so hard to scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: GET ONE OF THESE NOW
customer_reviews.text: You need this and only this and there are no other words. Fresh soup. Fresh soymilk and even Jelly. Heck yeah.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Sparks

customer_reviews.title: It works well, soy milk is much cheaper than buying in the store
customer_reviews.text: Works well, a bit of a pain to clean. We use it to make soy milk, we make a daily batch.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is good. Still need brush to clean. Sometimes it will spillover if I add more water than the min level. Still have improvement space
customer_reviews.author: KorinnKulin

customer_reviews.title: Has durability!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my mom She’s had it for over a Year and still worksGreat . I just bought one for me so I can start making my own Grain and bean milk fresh and Free of preservatives , chemicals and Vegan! Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love this soy milk maker. It is easy to use and makes fresh soy milk. So healthy!!
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great soy milk.
customer_reviews.text: Makes great soy milk. Much easier than my old one that often burnt the milk. I use it with dry beans mostly (because I always forget to soak the beans) and it works great, and seems to just take slightly longer than wet beans. Pays for itself if you have been buying soy milk.
customer_reviews.author: Thorburn C. Duryea

customer_reviews.title: making soy milk is good,
customer_reviews.text: For the dry soy milk mode is good. However, everytime i use pure soup mode to make pumpkin soup or potato soup, it burn the bottom. So it will take me a long time to clean the bottom. I reported this problem to the seller a week ago, and didn't get any reply back. I don't know has anyone have the same problem as me or not using the soup mode, but mine really burn the bottom whenever i use the soup mode. **edit: i got the reply now, thanks! i will try to add more water next time and trying to use powder to clean the burn part
customer_reviews.author: WU,YA-LI

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service but Overflow if cooked with green bean (mung bean)
customer_reviews.text: Not working well if cooked with green bean (mung bean), it overflows. Great customer service, assisting the returns.
customer_reviews.author: Suria

customer_reviews.title: It is time consuming to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Product is very easy to use. It arrived well and safely packed. However, it is missing the cleaning brush, which is said in the box to be included. It wasn't. I don't want to go through the trouble of returning the whole thing. Can I have the cleaning brush sent to my shipping address?
customer_reviews.author: Marciamp

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Especially I am kind of like homemade ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous... I love it. Especially I am kind of like homemade food, so it’s the best product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chenda Pov

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great and perfect. Let see how long it last, so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Vinh S. Dao

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: amazing machine, works very well. I will do tigher nut milk and soy milk too. Thanks in advance.

customer_reviews.title: Cutting the chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I’ve made almond milk and coconut milk. Incredible! Can’t wait for fall for soups

customer_reviews.title: Not good for all function... porridge doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I wait for good machine for multiple task. I cooked the porridge, but it failed. The water was overflow. I return it.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Everything it says its capable of, is 100% true. The recipe book is great as well. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Makes hot soup and fast
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use is good and no choices for consistency is level.
customer_reviews.author: Ahn

customer_reviews.title: OMG Beautiful Presto item
customer_reviews.text: OMG Beautiful Presto item. I can make as many milks as i want. I hope it comes out so good... Very promt and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Salvado

customer_reviews.title: good soy milk machine
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make different nuts milk two days for a week.

customer_reviews.title: ,,,,,,,,,,,,, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the best appliance I want. I make soy milk every weekend

customer_reviews.title: Hi
customer_reviews.text: We are happy for your purchase. But it did not work. I am sorry to have returned it to you. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: bad product! just broken after using 3 times.! Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: bad product! just broken after using 3 times.! Do not buy!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son and daughter in law. They were totally impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Pesto soy milk maker
customer_reviews.text: Big capacity, easy to use, easy to wash. I got this for Christmas; So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: CCH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and excellent delivery time. Product has exceeded my expectations because when drink milks are recent prepared by presto pure, flavour is excelllent. It is a recommendable product, but it is necesary to take good care of it. I bought a couple of these devices and the first one after one year had a failure in one of the buttons to prepare milk, but when I requested support I received a notice that I will receive a new one in replacement. Excellent support.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Castro

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: first one used it was good but after make milk for awhile there is weird noise
customer_reviews.author: Lily Ennamorato

customer_reviews.title: What a great machine!
customer_reviews.text: It is really easy and simple to operate. It also looks stylish. I already bought two more for my friends. I may buy two more for my mother and sister because I think it is the best one in the market. Just go ahead and get it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I have been looking for a product like ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have been looking for a product like this for awhile now, glad I finally found it. May buy another one for my brother if this one keeps performing this well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dannenberg

customer_reviews.title: I loved this....but
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 1 year and was not repairable Way too costly and does not last
customer_reviews.author: confusing

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, great GREAT machine. It's so easy, works very fast and is easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shain

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this one
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this one, looks great. I've already made several batches of soy milk and it was so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works fine for making soy
customer_reviews.text: The porridge came out just light cream my soup. It works fine for making soy milk
customer_reviews.author: JW from Danville, CA

customer_reviews.title: Healthy made easy with this
customer_reviews.text: When you've got a counter full of gadgets, one more is the last thing you want - but this one is a keeper. I've made almond milk from dry twice, from soaked once, & soup once (which after a little addition impressed even my mom the chef in training). I must admit: I do use a cheesecloth & not the included strainer, but that's my choice as I'm more fussy about the amount of remaining pulp. The fact that I can load & leave it go is HUGE in my crazy day. I rarely give 5 stars, but this gadget gets one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and performance
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a different brand JouYang for soymilk making for years and thought about switching for a change. What a mistake! I have two main complaints. 1. It dones't have a pouring sprout and when dumping soy milk to a pitcher, it tends to spill outside. 2. Sometimes, the soymilk can taste a bit "raw". I end up needing to pre-cook the beans or boil the soymilk afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: One of the best soy milk makers on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile since it can handle dry or soaked beans and holds 1.9 liters- one of the largest in capacity. Makes excellent soy milk fairly quickly and in a good quantity. Sturdy dual stainless steel wall construction also provides some insulation. Exterior is easy to keep clean. It could do with a pour spout though, because it always drips and dribbles after pouring. Top handle could be more comfortable. The included carafe could be bigger and the strainer could be finer. Occasionally will overflow even when filled to the MIN mark.
customer_reviews.author: Harv M

customer_reviews.title: From dry soy beans, fantastic, and way more milk than any other machine
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stainless steel machine. It is easy to use, and it makes far more milk than any other machine, and from dry beans. It takes diligence to keep clean as it cannot have any running water on it, but they provide a scrubber and a brush for easy cleanup. It is really no problem. I have made two batches of milk so far and very pleased. Cant wait to make pureed soups.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen & James B

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a good machine, and I am happy I ordered it. The blending power is strong. I have tried it with several nuts and soy beans. Everything I use it wet nuts I don't even have to strain the milk because it is perfectly blended. However, it waggles a little bit while in use. It seems that the base is not even. I also don't like that to turn off the machine someone has to be thee to unplug the cord. If not, the beep continues until someone does. I am happy with my purchase. though.
customer_reviews.author: Emineth

customer_reviews.title: Put in the ingredients and let the machine do the rest!
customer_reviews.text: To save the planet from plastic, I decided to make my own plant milk. Almond, oat really easy. Then I tried soy. Soy needs to cook. Little hard on your hands to squeeze through a nut bag. So I looked on Amazon for an easier way. This machine is amazing, it does everything for you. If you want to make your own plant milk, get one today!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I first made Almond Milk and was amazed by how fine the almond meal turned out. I found never get it that fine in the blender. Inthen made Rice Milk, than Coconut Milk. The recipe booklet is helpful, but I found that I had to tweek each recipe for a more robust flavor. The machine is a little loud, but does a great job. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Musical mama

customer_reviews.title: Good for vegan soup!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has a few recipes included. Recipes for things like quinoa and hemp milk would be much appreciated! I made the most amazing potato soup by throwing a bunch of raw veggies plus oats in and pushing ‘soup’: so easy! I wish, however, you weren’t required to add so much water. Once I added less than the minimum (to make cashew cream) and the momentum of the blender sloshed milk over the rim and made a mess.
customer_reviews.author: yourRN

customer_reviews.title: Love the size of it
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of it. I can make more than 1 quart of soy milk at a time. The strainer works very well for removing the okara. I also use it to make soups and it purees them nicely. It is a little bit noisy but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: EFFORTLESS SOYMILK
customer_reviews.text: This appliance makes millk production a snap. With very little effort I can make smooth and "creamy" soy milk. If you are planning to use the soy milk for tofu I highly recommend using Idavees's nylon nut milk bag. I can now make tofu without standing in front of the stove for hours. Because it is stainless steel inside and out cleanup is easy. All in all, it is a great addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have already made three batches of soy milk. Fine grind. Just the right thickness with the supplied strainer. Good taste with 3 bags Stevia, a pinch of salt and a table spoon of vanilla. Run through strainer in batches cleaning out in between. Save pulp to make cheese, dips, add to homemade bread, etc.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD R MEYER

customer_reviews.title: All around great appliance
customer_reviews.text: This will pay for itself in no time, plus the milk is much better tasting than store bought! I mostly make soymilk from dried soybeans and almond milk from soaked raw almonds, but the machine can do other types of plant milks and blended soups. It's a very set-it-and-forget-it appliance and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: The best maker for soy milk !
customer_reviews.text: This maker is best that I have ever used, the knife makes soybeans so meticulous with the accessories that are good matched to work well. I Do like this maker, you should have one or make it to be a gift for your family or friends. By the way nice price and service!
customer_reviews.author: Mei-Lan Shih Royall

customer_reviews.title: Loving my soup maker & it's not even winter!
customer_reviews.text: Love to make soup & smoothies in this ldavee. It's so easy to use, wash and reuse again. You can have a delicious homemade soup in less than 30 min. Smoothies? 5 min! Love to be able to eat healthy and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Danmar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love it capacity. Very easy to wash. When it broke ( not heated up well) within a year, I contacted the company by email. I got response right away and they send me a replacement. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: yogi bear

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life safer. Can't seem to get anyone on the phone. All of the recopies are excellent,especially the soup and porridge. Waiting to make juice and milk. Recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: tchaas

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: So far have only made Almond milk and so far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It extremely hard to clean because you dont want to get the electronics wet. Other than that its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: The milk was delicious, this pot makes it so easy to make. I love it and would recommend it to anyone. This milk is much better than store bought milk
customer_reviews.author: Eileen N Henry

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, bit difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Like the look, functions fine. Bit difficult to clean, have to be careful not to get the top part and bottom part safe from water.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good machine for soymilk
customer_reviews.text: Easy making soy milk, inside the difference country language user guide is not in correct translated,

customer_reviews.title: Very good machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I make different kind of healthy milks. So easy. Also, customer service was great!

customer_reviews.title: It’s looking good
customer_reviews.text: To me is easy to use, I like it !
customer_reviews.author: Meiling

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!! So glad I bought it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! ! ! ! It's easy and quick to use. I expect to save a lot of money using this machine.
customer_reviews.author: M Jane Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and clean. It has relative large capacity for 3-6 persons use
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We like this product. It's the best soymilk machine I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's birthday and she loved it! She's had a few other machines in the past but when I saw this one, I knew she'd love it. It looks great and she said it actually makes better milk than her old ones. I noticed that it wasn't as loud which made me happy. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Marco A. Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Until you own this product, you probably won't understand ...
customer_reviews.text: Until you own this product, you probably won't understand what it does. We primarily use it to grind soy beans to make "tonyu" (soy milk), then we take the by-product ("okara", all the fiber and minerals left behind) and add it to other dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Francis McNally

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the old fashioned way. Works as described. Temperature gets too hot and affects the flavor of the milk. Save your money. Amazon is wonderful about accepting returns like this one
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Ramirez

product_meta.title: Idavee Brand - PrestoPure IAE15-1.9 Liter Automatic Hot Soy Milk (Almond, Rice, Quinoa Milk) Soup, Porridge & Cold Juice Maker - 2 Layer Stainless Steel - Recipe Booklet
feature_bullets: 1.9 liter capacity (1/2 gallon) - largest on the market - recipe booklet included
7 functions in one machine - make milk, porridge, oatmeal, pureed soup, juice, and more

Perfect for nut milk such as almond, cashew, macadamias, Brazil nuts, hazelnut, pecan, and pistachio. Try it with seeds such as hemp, quinoa, pumpkin, sunflower, sesame, and flaxseed. Works for rice, coconut, oat milk too
Dual layer stainless steel body/chamber, filterless grinding for easy cleaning, bottom heating for even cooking
1-year fix or replace guarantee (U.S. only), parts and labor included
